critique: The document is a presidential order focused on advancing educational equity, excellence, and economic opportunity through Hispanic-Serving Institutions (HSIs). It aims to strengthen the capacity of HSIs, increase their participation in Federal programs, and ensure their continued role as engines of educational opportunity and economic mobility. The order establishes the White House Initiative on Advancing Educational Equity, Excellence, and Economic Opportunity Through Hispanic-Serving Institutions and the President's Board of Advisors on Hispanic-Serving Institutions.
